Among these structures, a red double-decker bus stands out, adding a pop of color to the otherwise monochrome palette. This bus, a common sight in many cities, suggests the presence of public transportation in the area.

Cars of various colors are scattered along the street, indicating a mix of private and public transportation. Their movement adds dynamism to the scene, hinting at the hustle and bustle typical of city life.
